page.title: 05INDUSTRY AND MANUFACTURING
page.content: There is a new trading estate in Sturminster Newton it is situated in the lower part of the town. {MILK BOARD}The big chedder cheeses weigh 27kg, the small cheeses are 18kg. Most of it is sold locally around the country but at one time it was sold abroad. Each day they use 70,000 pints of milk. For 1 pint of milk they produce 1 pound of cheese. {J & M MODELS}Most of their train models are sent abroad mainly to America but sometimes to Switzerland. The prices of engines are Â£800 and the coaches are Â£400. {INTERNATIONAL HARVESTER}This company sells farming equipment for example tractors, combine harvesters and hay bailers. Most of it is sold locally but some is sold to New Zealand. {FOOD WATCH}This small firm works on food allergies.
